About Footscray Rugby Club

Founded in 1928, we stand as a pillar of Victorian rugby with a rich history of producing excellence both on and off the field. We‚Äôve contributed five Wallabies to Australian rugby and continue competing at the highest level in the Premier Division of the Victorian Rugby Union.

Our club embraces the spirit of ‚Äòmana‚Äô (pride, strength) and ‚Äòaiga‚Äô (family), creating an inclusive environment where everyone can thrive. As the only Dewar Shield team in the West, we‚Äôre building a legacy that connects our proud history with an exciting future.

Join us in shaping the future of rugby in West Melbourne while growing your brand.

Technical Notes for Website Implementation

Content Management

  • Update partnership tiers and pricing as needed
  • Add/remove sponsor logos dynamically

  • Update statistics annually (digital reach, membership numbers)

Call-to-Action Elements
